title: Switch from pulsesrc to pipewiresrc audio source
description:
Replace PulseAudio source with PipeWire source for modern Linux audio capture.

## Research Method

Using  to enumerate element properties (as pioneered with opusenc):
```bash
# Inspect pipewiresrc properties
gst-inspect-1.0 pipewiresrc

# Example used for opusenc:
gst-inspect-1.0 opusenc | grep -A 5 'audio-type'
```

## Properties to Audit

Compare pulsesrc vs pipewiresrc properties:
- Device selection (device name/path)
- Buffer configuration (buffer-time, latency-time)
- Client name application identification
- Stream name
- PipeWire-specific properties (node, path, fd)

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Research pipewiresrc available properties via gst-inspect
- [ ] Identify differences from pulsesrc API
- [ ] Update PipelineConfig struct to support pipewire-specific options
- [ ] Replace pulsesrc with pipewiresrc in pipeline
- [ ] Update config file defaults if needed
- [ ] Test audio capture with pipewiresrc
- [ ] Update documentation to reflect PipeWire usage
- [ ] Note any dependencies (pipewire library)
